itunes:title: Guests Are Finally Back! (Pierson Wodzynski)
title: Guests Are Finally Back! (Pierson Wodzynski)
itunes:author: Joe Vulpis & Ilya Feddy
itunes:summary:
You asked, and we shall deliver! We met Pierson at a party and NOW WE'RE FRIENDS!  She's a massive YouTuber with 2,000,000 subs and makes insane entertaining content. We figure our celebrity look-a-likes, being a snake, naming our kids Ilya, and roasting our embarrassing photos.

Check out Pierson on instagram @piersonwodzynski

Thanks for listening squad, check out our IG @lightweightspod
